mongodb.connection_server_management.swi.message: Error 503: Service unavailable - MongoDB server is currently unreachable. Please check your network connection and server status.
Error 408: Connection timeout - Failed to establish connection to MongoDB server within the specified timeout period.
Error 500: Internal server error - MongoDB server encountered an unexpected error while processing the connection request.

mongodb.connection_server_management.mon.message: Error 503: Service unavailable - Unable to retrieve MongoDB logs due to server connectivity issues.
Error 500: Internal server error - Failed to retrieve MongoDB logs due to an internal server error.
Error 403: Access denied - Insufficient permissions to access MongoDB logs.
